abstracts.cdata!:
The Bank loan would continue support for
            an ongoing and expanded Bank assisted lending program of JDB
            for on-farm investments. Sub-loans would be made to about
            200 commercial farmers for increased production of beef,
            dairy products, sheep, goats, coconuts, citrus, mango and
            avocado. Agro-industrial investments for marketing,
            processing and production of agricultural inputs will also
            be eligible for financing. Technical assistance, including
            training abroad and on-going studies of the sugar industry,
            will also be financed from the loan.
